DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine effect guide imagery intervention perceive stress pregnant adolescent .
DOC.brief_title: Guided Imagery : Reducing Stress Improving Well-being Pregnant Adolescents
DOC.detailed_description: Pregnant adolescent attend local alternative education program subject study . Students participate four , 15 minute guide imagery session 4-6 week period . They complete pregnancy specific stress questionnaire begin completion guide imagery protocol . The student also complete short 9-question stress measure individual guide imagery session . The specific aim : 1. evaluate whether guided imagery intervention reduces perceive stress pregnant adolescent ; 2. evaluate whether guided imagery intervention enhance well-being pregnant adolescent . The hypothesis intervention reduce perceive stress enhance well-being subject . The purpose study ass whether employ guide imagery intervention pregnant teens education reduce perceive stress level improve well-being .
DOC.criteria: All pregnant student age 1321 enrolled alternative education program parenting teen eligible participate Participants exclude study deliver baby prior complete four session guide imagery intervention .
